title: VibeCheck
description: A music-based social networking application integrating Spotify API for real-time user engagement. Deployed on AWS with Travis CI/CD.

title: Document Authenticator
description: A system to authenticate documents using Azure OCR and machine learning, achieving over 80% accuracy in text extraction.

title: Store Inventory Management System
description: A Java Spring web application for store inventory management, integrating MySQL database for robust data handling.
